story.summary: (1.8) - PORCH - Generic - Add table\view full path to right panel

test_cases.title: Verify full path for table displays in the right panel
test_cases.description: Validate that the full path (Catalog/DB/Schema) for a table is displayed correctly in the right panel when selected.
test_cases.preconditions: A table named 'Sales' exists in the 'Finance' schema under the 'MainDB' catalog.

steps.action: Select table 'Sales' from the left panel
steps.expected_result: The right panel updates to show the 'Sales' table details with the full path: 'MainDB/Finance/Sales'

steps.action: Verify the displayed path in the right panel
steps.expected_result: The displayed path is exactly 'MainDB/Finance/Sales' in the right panel

test_cases.expected_result: Full path is displayed correctly for the table in the right panel

test_cases.title: Verify full path for view displays in the right panel
test_cases.description: Validate that the full path (Catalog/DB/Schema) for a view is displayed correctly in the right panel when selected.
test_cases.preconditions: A view named 'MonthlyReport' exists in the 'Finance' schema under the 'MainDB' catalog.

steps.action: Select view 'MonthlyReport' from the left panel
steps.expected_result: The right panel updates to show the 'MonthlyReport' view details with the full path: 'MainDB/Finance/MonthlyReport'

steps.action: Verify the displayed path in the right panel
steps.expected_result: The displayed path is exactly 'MainDB/Finance/MonthlyReport' in the right panel

test_cases.expected_result: Full path is displayed correctly for the view in the right panel

test_cases.title: Verify integration with existing user interface components
test_cases.description: Ensure the full path display integrates properly with existing table/view selection workflows in the right panel.
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged into the platform with access to the 'MainDB' catalog.

steps.action: Select 'MainDB' catalog from the left panel
steps.expected_result: The right panel displays all tables/views available in 'MainDB'

steps.action: Select a table and view from the displayed options
steps.expected_result: The right panel updates to show the selected table/view and its full path

test_cases.expected_result: Full paths are displayed correctly after selecting from different components

test_cases.title: Verify user receives error message when selecting non-existent table/view
test_cases.description: Check that the user is informed with an error when attempting to select a table/view that does not exist.
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and no item named 'FakeTable' exists in the 'MainDB' catalog.

steps.action: Attempt to select 'FakeTable' from the left panel

test_cases.expected_result: User is alerted with an appropriate error message when selecting a non-existent item

test_cases.title: Verify the full path display respects character limits
test_cases.description: Ensure the full path displayed does not exceed character limits as outlined in company guidelines.
test_cases.preconditions: A table named 'VeryLongTableNameThatExceedsNormalLength' exists in the 'Finance' schema under the 'MainDB' catalog.

steps.action: Select table 'VeryLongTableNameThatExceedsNormalLength' from the left panel
steps.expected_result: The right panel shows an abbreviated or truncated full path if it exceeds character limits

test_cases.expected_result: The full path is displayed within character limits and handled appropriately

test_cases.title: Verify full path updates correctly after schema change
test_cases.description: Validate that the full path in the right panel updates accurately when the schema of a table/view changes.
test_cases.preconditions: A table 'Sales' exists in the 'Finance' schema under 'MainDB'.

steps.action: Change the schema of 'Sales' from 'Finance' to 'SalesData' in the database.
steps.expected_result: Right panel should reflect the updated path to 'MainDB/SalesData/Sales' after the change
The right panel shows the updated full path: 'MainDB/SalesData/Sales'

test_cases.expected_result: Full path reflects the updated schema correctly in the right panel

metadata.ai_reasoning: The main change in this story is the addition of the full path for tables/views displayed in the right panel of the user interface. This enhancement is intended to improve user understanding of the context of each table/view by providing a complete path (e.g., Catalog/DB/Schema). The acceptance criteria indicate that this update should be functional and is labeled with specific components and tasks. Therefore, it is crucial to ensure that the display of table/view paths is accurate and that it integrates well with existing features. The tests will cover core functionalities, integration with existing workflows, and potential error cases. Additionally, given that this feature relates to data visibility, edge cases will be included to test limits of data display. Based on the story context and company documentation, the following tests have been formulated to validate that the implementation meets its requirements.

summary: These tests verify that the table/view full paths are displayed correctly in the right panel, ensuring complete and accurate representation of data context, integration with existing components, and proper error handling.
